website_summaries.verdict: This affordable hiking shoe from Merrell earned generally positive feedback from the hiking community. It did not fall short on providing comfort and grip. Those who like a spacious forefoot and flexible footgear will surely enjoy its confines too. However, it seems that its default laces were a cause of disappointment. To summarize, getting the Merrell Alverstone may require replacing its laces to optimize and perfect its trail performance.
pros: The majority appreciated the affordable purchase price of the Merrell Alverstone
Immediate comfort was granted by this shoe, as observed by a handful
Its flexibility earned praises from a few owners
According to several users, its rubber outsole delivered excellent traction
It runs true to size, based on almost all customer reviews
Some wearers applauded the roomy forefoot of the Alverstone
These are the new go-to shoes of a few new-to-the-brand pleased owners
cons: A couple of displeased hikers declared that the laces of the Alverstone from Merrell untie easily

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY light duty walking shoes at best. Absolutely zero support, more like wearing slippers. I am very disappointed with the quality of Merrills it seems like they have gone way down when it comes to quality footwear. I'm not just ranting, I've been happy with their products in the past but the past 2-3 pairs of shoes I have purchased have been way below expectations. Will not be ordering anymore Merrill products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for all day comfort at work
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work. I wanted a shoe that was a bit tougher than a tennis shoe but breathable and athletic. I am on concrete floors all day so comfort is a must. I tried these out for a week (40 hours). After switching out insoles (three different pairs) due to lack of comfort I gave up. The heel felt really high and pushed my feet forward and flexibility was lacking. After trying Merrills twice with no luck I won’t try again. Went out and bought a pair of Asics instead with no regrets. They might last half as long but they were also half the price.
customer_reviews.author: jonny

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched Shoes, Two Different Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Evidently Merrell's quality control is nonexistent. I order a pair (that would be 2) of size 14 shoes. I achieved half of that goal, in that I received one size 14 and one size 12. Of course I've had to return them, and have yet to receive a replacement pair. Very disappointed that providing two shoes of the same size is so difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Daddio

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these in a wide but could have gotten by with regular
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a wide since I've been having issues with other shoe manufacturers being too small and tight but I could have gotten by with the standard width. I will continue to by Merrell shoes since they last forever and their shoe size fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Great Merrell Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes to replace a pair of Merrells that I had worn out. The overall fit and finish of these shoes was as expected. I feel like it should have had one more set of eyes, because the gaps between the laces crossing over is kind of wide, and causes the tongue to bulge a bit more than I would like, and also affects the overall aesthetic of the shoe, but overall it's a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jesmo5

customer_reviews.title: Oversized and no side support
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is over size even for my 14W feet. There is little side support while walking even after tightening up the laces. The laces are too short for a double knot! I’m surprised to see such a poorly designed shoe from Merrell. Over the past ten years I’ve bought 7-8 pairs of shoes in 3 different styles made by Merrell. The Alverston model is not up to the usual Merrell quality and were returned quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BfloBen

customer_reviews.title: Either too wide or not enough
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a wide toe box, read on. I bought 10 Wide. They're wide enough in the toes, but they're also wide in the hill. Since they're low, they need to be carefully laced to make up for that, and I just - just! - can make it work. Another option from Merrell - Yokota 2 in Wide - has much better hill retention, but a narrower (or just more slanted in?) toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Nekrasov

customer_reviews.title: Merrell hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and seemed to fit good but after a few miles the left shoe seemed to loosen up quite a bit in the toe box and arch area. In comparison to three other pairs that I rotate when walking this pair did not have the same comfort feel.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with light weight
customer_reviews.text: Good support in a light weight walking shoe. After 13 hours and 2 flight connections, my feet were still comfortable. Bought these as a less expensive, lighter weight option to the Moab Vent 2. The Alverstone is a great choice for all day on your feet or getting around town. I still love the Vent 2's for hiking or rough terrain (on my third pair). Will buy both again, especially since they are available in wide widths.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I'm really impressed with the quality, comfort, and fit of these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Ordinarily, wouldn't bother with a review, but these shoes look and feel great. I almost (almost, that is) went a half size larger, but took a chance on my regular size, and what do ya know? They not only fit well, but even when I put on sport socks, they still have just a tad of "breathing room" at the tip of the toe. My first pair of Merrells; but won't be my last!
customer_reviews.author: Mihan Josephson

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Merrell is one of the few shoes that I can wear without additional arch support (Yep, I have high arches) Quality is always 5 star and fit is exactly as stated. I have several pair and will continue to purchase the brand. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable and the size indicator is fairly accurate, running slightly to the larger size. The shoe strings are terrible as they are smooth & shiny and don't bind very well. I suspect this condition may lessen over time with tying/knotting. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Dave

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel like they crush my feet side to side I wore them yesterday for a couple hours and my foot feels like it was crushed in a vice Return window is closed so I guess Im stuck with crap shoes that I can't even wear Good job merrell garbage
customer_reviews.author: Jason Layman

customer_reviews.title: these shoes don't loose their shape!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes as as most shoes do, DON'T lose their shape. I buy mostly Merrels as i am on my feet 7 days a week. I tried Propet's and wasted money. So back to the dependable Merrells the only complaint i have is that the shoe laces do not stay tied. But i countered that by putting in shoe lock laces.
customer_reviews.author: stephen weaver

customer_reviews.title: NARROW ANKLE, WIDE TOES...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a wide like I normally do, but the wide in this boot applies only to the toes. The mid shoe is still narrow until you get to the toes. If your foot is shaped like a ducks, this shoe should be best for you.
customer_reviews.author: 🦇🦠🚒🚑🚓🚁

customer_reviews.title: You'll love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them. You might order a half size larger than normal. I usually order a 9 wide and these fit perfectly width- wise, but maybe 1/4 a size too short. However, if you snug up the laces your toes won't touch the ends. The sturdiness and grip are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great fitting merrel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this merrel shoe it fits me exactly how I would like a shoe to fit . It’s a little roomy in the toe area but snug everywhere else .
customer_reviews.author: willard persinger

customer_reviews.title: Really great shoe
customer_reviews.text: It is well made, comfortable, and affordable. I've been wearing New Balance for years but a friend recommended trying a pair of Merrell's and I'm glad he did. I won't hesitate to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great show.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. They are a Merrill. Always have enjoyed their products. Breath well and are very comfortable. Will be buying another pair when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. It has a very high arch support. After two weeks on the warehouse floor, they still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good Merrell choice
customer_reviews.text: Better feeling shoe than the updated Merrell Moab II. Moab II is not the shoe that the original Moab was.
customer_reviews.author: D.M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Broke after10 days!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The leather eyelet ( where the shoe lace goes through broke after 10 days.... on 80 dollar shoes? Liked the comfort but that's inexcusable
customer_reviews.author: Freezing in the USA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hiking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have hiked in these shoes several times and they have exceeded my expectations for comfort and durability. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband and he really likes the traction they provide and the comfort. I like the style!
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, look great, and great for the value. Extremely pleased with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a very good foot bed. I do Physical Therapy for a living and most shoes are flat as a board in the insole. These have good arch support right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Men's Alverstone Hiking Shoe  Perfect Fit, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Merrell Men's Alverstone Hiking Shoe are true to size. Fit Perfectly and are very comfortable for all day wear. Thank You : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel good
customer_reviews.text: I returned these, when I put on one of them had something on the inside of shoe that hurt my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Where the ratings

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great brand!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Merrell shoes. They fit great and price was reasonable. Wears them to work everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. They are really Comfortable and he can wear them with his custom insoles. They fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hashbean

customer_reviews.title: Good hikers
customer_reviews.text: Merrill are the best hikers made. These are middle of the road shoes but are still very good. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: LARRY R WHITLEY

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Merrell's. I own 3 pair now. They last FOREVER and are EXTREMELY comfortable. If you don't own a pair, and do a lot of walking... you NEED a pair. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair, I love these, they fit my wide feet just fime
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Merrill’s for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived very quick and fit great. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: mrod

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Tried on in the store so I'd know they fit. Very comfy. Better than wearing my with boots for day to day activities but stronger than normal tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Erin F

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Merrill shoes. Very durable and comfortable will definitely keep buying in the future.
customer_reviews.author: WarEagle

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet for 12 hours a day on concrete. I wear these shoes at least 2 out of the 4 days I work and my feet are half as tired as normal. The arch support is just what I needed. This is my second set of Merrell shoes and my first lasted 2 years. I am already searching for the next pair for the other two days of the week.
customer_reviews.author: RebelScout

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and great quality. These are my husbands favorite sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: wide as promised. color is darker than expected. hard sole.
customer_reviews.text: color is more grayish than blueish. sole harder than expected, better for rock hiking, less for paved road. upper is probably same part like narrow fit, so you get a wide part of the tongue shown, i prefer narrower view. breathability is acceptable. most important for me: width and length are great.
customer_reviews.author: Zuri

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light on the hiking trails. Best shoe I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Dale H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It fits my feet. It is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zhong Jian Tan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit good and are comfortable. I received them the end of May. I try to walk three miles every day. Today I happened to look at the bottom of the shoes and on one the heal is worn badly and the other the heal is showing signs of wear. Both on one side of the heal. They are only two months old. I have had other shoes that have done that but they would last ten to twelve months.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy A Baert

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes are defined by not even realizing your wearing any!!!! These are the ones!!
customer_reviews.author: michaelmary3

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love these shoes...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look and feel of these shoes. Unfortunately, the eyelet on my left shoe ripped when fastening my shoes for only the 2nd hike. This rendered the shoe unusable and had to return them so I'm only giving 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Igotitfirst!

customer_reviews.title: 12's running small.
customer_reviews.text: Noce shoe wish it fit properly. Love Merril products but last 2 pairs have run small. I'm a 12 and since there is no 12 and a half and 13 would be way to big, I moved to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: matthew mccloskey

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Hiking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and one of the most comfortable pair of shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Pure comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great trail shoe, also should work great for disc golf. Can't wait for the snow to melt...
customer_reviews.author: Steven Geisman

customer_reviews.title: Merrel shoes
customer_reviews.text: I liked nothing about the product, Where is my refund?? It's not in my account in which it was paid with.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. V

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, but squeaky
customer_reviews.text: Quiet when I bought them, but now, the right heel has started squeaking when I walk. It's not the insert, but seems to be between the rubber bottom and the shank. A very irritating noise
customer_reviews.author: lee s Lovorn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my boyfriend’s second pair if these shoes. He loves them and wears them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Primaholic

customer_reviews.title: Merrell brand shoes have a lot to offer
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes at a fair price. I have owned several pairs of Merrell brand shoes and they always seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: dusty a damon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.. super comfortable.. good for walk, hiking or work
customer_reviews.text: They sent me a wrong size in the beginning but after that all good
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Merrell's are the best for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy as I am on my feet 8 hours most days :)
customer_reviews.author: Melody Hermel

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes fit my husband exactly as they should since he has a small foot but high instep
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, and great value bought on sale. Moabs are a bit sturdier. I would still recommend these especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: With the tighter heel and wider toe box, these are the perfect fit for me to hike comfortably for miles on end.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I would buy them again, but maybe 1/2 a size smaller next time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped they were.
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely buy again! Fit great. True to size, toe box is nicer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: chad albritton

customer_reviews.title: As expected from merrell
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes as expected from merrell Shipping was fast Well satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The heel strike is the best ever.
customer_reviews.text: Everyday walking , not much brake in time, a very nice comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J. V.

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Took a 5 mile hike and all is well. Now need a size 9.5 for the wife
customer_reviews.author: Duane c.

customer_reviews.title: It fits very well.
customer_reviews.text: I hike a lot, so I expect my shoes to be pain-free.
customer_reviews.author: basil  chukwu

customer_reviews.title: Bad fabric
customer_reviews.text: Shoelace eyelet fabric broke after one week, still nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jerad Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and quality in one!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY nicely made sandal. Butter soft leather, supportive yet dainty sole and very comfortable. Nice change from the usual nylon and foam sandals that cost just about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna M.

customer_reviews.title: slippery on foot
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever wear these because the footbed is so slippery I can't keep them on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: "P"

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Alverstone Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: This suede hiking boot is built to provide all-day comfort and full-foot protection for days spent on the trail.
feature_bullets: Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
Merrell Kinetic Fit BASE removable contoured footbed for flexible support
